ajoumeow REST API Documentation

2021년 02월 21일

GitHub 저장소

Auth API


[POST] /auth/login

Logins with ID. Returns JWT token and user data, feeding statistics.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    id: [integer]

  • Required Headers
    None

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: [JWT TOKEN],
  data: {
    user: {
      ID: [integer],
      name: [string],
      role: [string]
    },
    semister: [string],
    statistics: [Array]
  }
}
    • Error:
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "등록되지 않은 학번입니다.",
  data: "ERR_NOT_REGISTERED"
}


[POST] /auth/autologin

Logins with JWT Token. Returns user data and feeding statistics.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: {
    user: {
      ID: [integer],
      name: [string],
      role: [string]
    },
    semister: [string],
    statistics: [Array]
  }
}
    • Error:
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "등록되지 않은 학번입니다.",
  data: "ERR_NOT_REGISTERED"
}


Record API


[GET] /record

Returns feeding application records between startDate and endDate.

  • URL Parameters
    startDate: [yyyy-mm-dd]
    endDate: [yyyy-mm-dd]

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    None

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: [{ UPDATE_TIME: [update time] }],
  data: [Array]
}


[POST] /record

Makes new feeding application record.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    ID: [integer]
    name: [string]
    date: [string]
    course: [string]

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 201
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: { 
  	affectedRows: [integer],
    insertId: [integer],
    warningStatus: [integer]
  }
}
    • Error:
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "이미 신청되었습니다.",
  data: "ERR_DUP_ENTRY"
}


[DELETE] /record

Deletes existing feeding application record.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    ID: [integer]
    name: [string]
    date: [string]
    course: [string]

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 204
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: { 
  	affectedRows: [integer],
    insertId: [integer],
    warningStatus: [integer]
  }
}


[GET] /record/statistics

Returns statistics data of total activities.

  • URL Parameters
    type: [ summary | this_feeding | this_total | prev_feeding | total_total | custom_total ]
    value: [yyyy-mm-dd|yyyy-mm-dd]
    value is required only when type is custom_total. Start date and end date separated with |

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    None

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [Array]
}
    • Error:
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "유효하지 않은 통계 유형입니다.",
  data: "ERR_INVALID_TYPE"
}


[GET] /record/log

Returns log data of server activities.

  • URL Parameters
    level: [string]
    type: [string]
    level and type is string separated with |

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [Array]
}


Verify API


[GET] /verify

Returns feeding application records and activity verification records between startDate and endDate.

  • URL Parameters
    startDate: [yyyy-mm-dd]
    endDate: [yyyy-mm-dd]

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: [Array],
  data: [Array]
}


[POST] /verify

Makes new activity verification record.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    data: [string]
    • data is a stringified Array of payloads.
      payload: { ID: [integer], date: [string], name: [string], course: [string], score: [string] }

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response
    • Success:
      • Code: 201
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [Array]
}


[DELETE] /verify

Deletes existing activity verification record.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    data: [string]
    • data is a stringified Array of payloads.
      payload: { ID: [integer], date: [string], name: [string], course: [string] }

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response
    • Success:
      • Code: 204
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [Array]
}


[GET] /verify/latest

Returns latest verification’s date.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [string]
}


[GET] /verify/1365

Returns generated 1365 verification pdf document.

  • URL Parameters
    month: [yyyy-mm]
    namelist: [string]

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response
    stream


Settings API


[GET] /settings/:name

Returns value of requested settings.

  • URL Parameters
    name: [string]

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    None

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [string]
}


[PUT] /settings/:name

Updates value of settings.

  • URL Parameters
    name: [string]

  • Data Parameters
    data: [string]

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: { 
  	affectedRows: [integer],
    insertId: [integer],
    warningStatus: [integer]
  }
}


Users API


[GET] /users/list

Returns list of members that matches semister parameter.
If semister value is all, returns list of namelist tables.

  • URL Parameters
    semister: [string]

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [Array]
}


[GET] /users/name

Returns info of single user by name.

  • URL Parameters
    query: [string]

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [Array]
}


[POST] /users/id

Add new user.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    단과대학: [string]
    학과: [string]
    학번: [string]
    이름: [string]
    전화번호: [string]
    생년월일: [string]
    1365 아이디: [string]
    가입 학기: [string]
    직책: [string]
    new: [bool]

  • Required Headers
    None

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 201
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: { 
  	affectedRows: [integer],
    insertId: [integer],
    warningStatus: [integer]
  }
}
    • Error:
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "지난 학기에 가입한 적이 있습니다.<br>기존 회원으로 등록해 주세요.",
  data: "ERR_REGISTERED_BEFORE"
}
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "기존 회원이 아닙니다.<br>신입 회원으로 등록해 주세요.",
  data: "ERR_NEVER_REGISTERED"
}
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "이미 이번 학기 회원으로 등록되셨습니다.'",
  data: "ERR_ALREADY_REGISTERED"
}


[PUT] /users/id

Updates user info.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    college: [string]
    department: [string]
    name: [string]
    phone: [string]
    birthday: [string]
    1365ID: [string]
    role: [string]
    register: [string]
    ID: [integer]

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: { 
  	affectedRows: [integer],
    insertId: [integer],
    warningStatus: [integer]
  }
}


[DELETE] /users/id

Deletes user info.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    ID: [integer]

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 204
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: { 
  	affectedRows: [integer],
    insertId: [integer],
    warningStatus: [integer]
  }
}
    • Error:
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "No matching ID",
  data: "ERR_NO_MATCHING_ID"
}


[GET] /users/register

Returns list of register applications that matches semister parameter.
If semister value is all, returns list of register namelist tables.

  • URL Parameters
    semister: [string]

  • Data Parameters
    None

  • Required Headers
    x-access-token: [JWT TOKEN]

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 200
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: [Array]
}


[POST] /users/register

Add new register application.

  • URL Parameters
    None

  • Data Parameters
    단과대학: [string]
    학과: [string]
    학번: [string]
    이름: [string]
    전화번호: [string]
    생년월일: [string]
    1365 아이디: [string]
    가입 학기: [string]
    직책: [string]
    new: [bool]

  • Required Headers
    None

  • Response

    • Success:
      • Code: 201
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "success",
  msg: null,
  data: { 
  	affectedRows: [integer],
    insertId: [integer],
    warningStatus: [integer]
  }
}
    • Error:
      • Code: 400
      • Content:
        {
  stat: "error",
  msg: "이미 가입 신청하셨습니다!<br>조금만 기다리시면 임원진이 연락을 드릴 거에요.",
  data: "ERR_ALREADY_REGISTERED"
}
